channel.title: Need help with PHP, p'ssing me off
channel.description:
I'm sorry if this is in the wrong section..
how can i run php so i can make a SMF forum? it says run install.php and my computer doesn't know what exe to run it on even though i have php. can someone help? Thanks.
~Skating On Java~

item.title: Need help with PHP, p'ssing me off
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

K, get the filepath of the file and put it in the address bar of the browser.

Read full topic

i have php on my computer… i have a active webserver but i know this sounds retarded but how the hell do i open it up in my web brouser?

item.title: Need help with PHP, p'ssing me off
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Oh man, retarded.

Do you have a PHP installed on your computer? Do you have an active webserver on your system?

You don’t run a .exe, by the way ;[ You open up install.php in your web browser.

Read full topic
